#include <iostream>
int main () {
	int testcases;
	std::cin>>testcases;
	int total, men, women, children;
	while (testcases-- >0) {
		std::cin>>total>>men>>women>>children;

		if (women > 2*men)
			women = 2*men;

		if (children > 4*(men+women))
			children= 4*(men+women);

		if (children > (4*total)/5)
			children = (4*total)/5;

		total -= children;
		if (women > (2*total)/3)
			women = (2*total)/3;

		total-=women;
		if (men>total)
			men = total;

		std::cout<<men<<" "<<women<<" "<<children<<std::endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
